restaurants.name: Al Mourjan Restaurant
restaurants.description: Authentic Qatari cuisine with stunning views of the Corniche waterfront. Famous for traditional dishes like machboos and harees.

restaurants.name: Spice Market
restaurants.description: Contemporary Indian cuisine with traditional spices and modern presentation techniques. Known for its tandoor dishes and vibrant ambiance.

restaurants.name: Nobu Doha
restaurants.description: World-renowned Japanese-Peruvian fusion cuisine with innovative dishes and premium ingredients. Signature dishes include Black Cod Miso and Yellowtail Jalapeño.

restaurants.name: Bandar Aden Restaurant
restaurants.description: Traditional Yemeni cuisine known for excellent fish dishes and aromatic rice preparations. A local favorite for authentic mandi and zurbian.

restaurants.name: La Spiga by Paper Moon
restaurants.description: Elegant Italian restaurant offering classic and contemporary dishes, handmade pasta, and a curated wine list. Renowned for its chic ambiance and attentive service.

restaurants.name: Al Terrace
restaurants.location: Al Mirqab Boutique Hotel, Souq Waqif
restaurants.description: Lebanese restaurant with a beautiful terrace overlooking Souq Waqif. Known for its mezze platters, grilled meats, and shisha in a lively setting.

restaurants.name: Mykonos
restaurants.description: Greek restaurant with a beachside setting, offering fresh seafood, grilled meats, and classic Greek desserts. Famous for its relaxed Mediterranean vibe.

restaurants.name: The Cheesecake Factory
restaurants.description: Popular American chain known for its extensive menu, generous portions, and over 30 varieties of cheesecake. Family-friendly and great for groups.

restaurants.name: Saffron Lounge
restaurants.description: Elegant Indian restaurant offering a modern take on classic dishes, with a focus on regional specialties and creative presentation.

restaurants.name: Jones the Grocer
restaurants.description: Modern gourmet eatery and deli offering international cuisine, artisan cheeses, and a curated selection of gourmet products. Great for breakfast, lunch, or dinner.

restaurants.name: Al Shurfa Arabic Lounge
restaurants.description: Rooftop restaurant with panoramic views of Souq Waqif, serving classic Middle Eastern dishes, mezze, and grilled specialties. Known for its shisha and sunset ambiance.

restaurants.name: Sakura Sushi Bar
restaurants.description: Authentic Japanese sushi bar with a modern twist, offering fresh sashimi, creative rolls, and a tranquil ambiance. Sushi chefs prepare dishes at the counter.

restaurants.name: El Rancho Steakhouse
restaurants.description: Lively South American steakhouse with a focus on grilled meats, live music, and a festive atmosphere. Famous for its churrasco and caipirinhas.

restaurants.name: Little Italy
restaurants.description: Family-friendly Italian trattoria serving wood-fired pizzas, homemade pastas, and classic desserts. Cozy ambiance and open kitchen.

restaurants.name: Green Garden Vegan Bistro
restaurants.description: Modern vegan bistro offering plant-based dishes, fresh juices, and a sustainable dining experience. Known for its creative salads and eco-friendly ethos.

cafes.name: Flat White Doha
cafes.description: Trendy Australian-style café with minimalist decor, serving expertly crafted flat whites, single-origin espresso, and gourmet brunch options. Popular with digital nomads and coffee aficionados.
cafes.seating: Modern communal tables and window bar

cafes.name: Urban Brew Lab
cafes.description: Innovative café with a focus on experimental brewing methods, molecular gastronomy-inspired pastries, and a rotating menu of global beans. Hosts regular coffee workshops and tastings.

cafes.name: Desert Rose Café
cafes.description: Charming outdoor café nestled in Aspire Park, offering traditional Qatari desserts, herbal teas, and light snacks. Perfect for families and park-goers seeking a relaxing break.

cafes.name: Bean & Quill
cafes.description: A haven for book lovers and students, this café offers a curated library, specialty coffee, and quiet study nooks. Regular author events and poetry nights.
cafes.seating: Armchairs, study desks, and reading corners

cafes.name: The Greenhouse Café
cafes.description: Eco-friendly café surrounded by lush greenery, serving organic coffee, vegan pastries, and fresh juices. Focus on sustainability and wellness.
cafes.seating: Garden patio and recycled wood tables

cafes.name: Majlis Espresso
cafes.description: Traditional Qatari majlis experience with specialty Arabic coffee, dates, and local snacks. Decorated with heritage artifacts and textiles.

cafes.name: Skyline Café
cafes.description: Rooftop café with breathtaking views of Doha's skyline, offering an international menu, signature mocktails, and live music on weekends.

cafes.name: Palette Café
cafes.description: Art-inspired café with a gallery space, creative workshops, and a menu of colorful, healthy dishes. Popular with artists and families.

cafes.name: Pearl Lounge Café
cafes.description: Exclusive lounge café with luxury desserts, premium coffee, and a private, tranquil setting overlooking the marina. Ideal for business meetings and special occasions.

cafes.name: Sunset Brews
cafes.description: Relaxed beach café with a focus on cold brews, fresh smoothies, and light bites. Perfect for unwinding after a swim or enjoying the sunset.

cafes.name: Brew Society
cafes.description: Trendy café with a focus on single-origin beans, pour-over brews, and gourmet pastries. Popular with young professionals and creatives.

cafes.name: Chai & Chat
cafes.description: Cozy spot for authentic Indian chai, street snacks, and friendly conversation. Known for its masala chai and samosas.

cafes.name: The Reading Room Café
cafes.description: A quiet retreat for book lovers, offering artisan coffee, light bites, and a curated library. Hosts regular book clubs and poetry nights.
cafes.seating: Armchairs, study desks, and reading corners

cafes.name: Desert Brew
cafes.description: Traditional Qatari café serving Arabic coffee, dates, and local sweets in a heritage-inspired setting. Great for cultural experiences.

cafes.name: Marina Mocha
cafes.description: Seaside café with a focus on specialty coffee, decadent desserts, and marina views. Perfect for relaxing after a stroll along the promenade.

shopping.name: Villaggio Mall
shopping.description: Venice-themed luxury shopping mall with gondola rides and high-end international brands.

shopping.name: Doha Festival City
shopping.description: Qatar's largest mall with over 400 stores, an indoor theme park, snow park, and a wide range of dining options. Family-friendly and great for all ages.

shopping.name: The Gate Mall
shopping.description: Upscale shopping destination with designer boutiques, gourmet restaurants, and art installations. Known for its elegant architecture and exclusive brands.

shopping.name: Souq Waqif
shopping.description: Historic market with traditional Qatari architecture, offering spices, textiles, souvenirs, and local crafts. A must-visit for cultural immersion.

shopping.name: City Center Mall
shopping.description: One of Doha's oldest and largest malls, featuring a wide range of shops, an ice rink, cinema, and food court. Conveniently located in the business district.

shopping.name: Lagoona Mall
shopping.description: Luxury mall with a serene ambiance, high-end boutiques, gourmet cafes, and regular fashion events. Popular with expats and locals alike.

shopping.name: Gold Souq
shopping.description: Traditional gold and jewelry market with competitive prices and custom designs. A favorite for wedding shopping and unique gifts.

shopping.name: Mall of Qatar
shopping.description: Massive shopping and entertainment complex with over 500 stores, a luxury hotel, and a family entertainment center. Hosts regular live shows and events.

shopping.name: Ezdan Mall
shopping.description: Popular mall in the Gharrafa area with a variety of retail stores, cafes, and a children's play area. Known for its convenience and family-friendly atmosphere.

shopping.name: Royal Plaza
shopping.description: Boutique shopping mall with a focus on luxury brands, designer boutiques, and gourmet dining. Elegant interiors and a relaxed shopping experience.

hotels.name: The Ritz-Carlton Doha
hotels.description: Iconic 5-star hotel with luxurious rooms, world-class dining, a private marina, and a lavish spa. Renowned for its impeccable service and stunning views of the Arabian Gulf.

hotels.name: Mandarin Oriental Doha
hotels.description: Elegant hotel blending Qatari heritage with modern luxury. Features rooftop pools, award-winning restaurants, and a holistic spa. Located in the heart of the city.

hotels.name: W Doha Hotel & Residences
hotels.description: Trendy 5-star hotel with vibrant nightlife, celebrity chef restaurants, and a luxurious spa. Known for its modern design and lively atmosphere.

hotels.name: InterContinental Doha Beach & Spa
hotels.description: Beachfront resort with a private beach, multiple pools, award-winning restaurants, and a luxurious spa. Perfect for families and leisure travelers.

hotels.name: Souq Waqif Boutique Hotels
hotels.description: Collection of boutique hotels in the heart of Souq Waqif, each with unique decor and personalized service. Ideal for cultural immersion and authentic experiences.

hotels.name: Oryx Airport Hotel
hotels.description: Convenient hotel inside Hamad International Airport, offering comfortable rooms, a wellness center, and 24-hour dining. Perfect for transit passengers.

hotels.name: Ezdan Hotel Doha
hotels.description: Large business hotel with extensive conference facilities, serviced apartments, and a variety of dining options. Popular with business travelers and long-stay guests.

hotels.name: Premier Inn Doha Education City
hotels.description: Affordable hotel with modern amenities, a rooftop pool, and easy access to Education City's universities and attractions. Great for students and families.

hotels.name: Marsa Malaz Kempinski
hotels.description: Palatial resort on its own island at The Pearl, featuring private beaches, a world-class spa, and multiple fine dining restaurants. Perfect for a luxury getaway.

hotels.name: Holiday Villa Hotel & Residence City Centre
hotels.description: Comfortable mid-range hotel with spacious rooms, a pool, and easy access to the city center. Popular with families and business travelers.

parks.name: Aspire Park
parks.description: The largest park in Doha, featuring lush green spaces, a large lake, walking and cycling tracks, playgrounds, and family picnic areas. Popular for outdoor activities and community events.
parks.best_time_to_visit: Evening for cooler weather and sunset views

parks.name: Al Bidda Park
parks.description: A scenic urban park along the Corniche, offering sports fields, botanical gardens, an outdoor gym, and dedicated dog parks. Hosts festivals and open-air events year-round.
parks.best_time_to_visit: Morning for exercise or weekends for events

parks.name: Oxygen Park
parks.description: A modern park designed for health and wellness, with jogging tracks, themed gardens, water features, and an amphitheater for community events. Family-friendly and eco-conscious.

parks.name: Sheraton Park
parks.description: Urban park with beautiful fountains, city skyline views, playgrounds, and walking paths. Conveniently located near major hotels and business centers.

parks.name: Katara Beach Park
parks.description: A family-friendly beach park with clean sands, water sports, shaded picnic areas, and nearby cafes. Perfect for swimming, sunbathing, and cultural events.

gyms.name: Fitness First Qatar
gyms.description: Modern gym with state-of-the-art equipment, group fitness classes, personal trainers, and wellness facilities. Popular with professionals and expats.

gyms.name: Aspire Active
gyms.description: Comprehensive sports and fitness center with Olympic pool, indoor track, martial arts, yoga, and nutrition counseling. Hosts community sports events.

gyms.name: The Venue Ladies Gym
gyms.description: Exclusive women-only gym with spa facilities, group classes, pilates, and a nutrition bar. Focused on privacy and wellness for women of all ages.

gyms.name: F45 Training Doha
gyms.description: Popular group fitness studio offering high-intensity interval training (HIIT), team workouts, and a supportive community atmosphere. Great for all fitness levels.

gyms.name: Oxygen Gym
gyms.description: Spacious gym open 24/7, equipped for weightlifting, cardio, boxing, and steam room relaxation. Flexible for busy schedules.

libraries.name: Qatar National Library
libraries.description: State-of-the-art national library with millions of books, a heritage collection, digital resources, and modern reading rooms. Hosts lectures, workshops, and cultural events.

libraries.name: Doha Public Library
libraries.description: Community library with a large children's section, study areas, free WiFi, and regular community events. Welcoming for all ages.

libraries.name: Education City Library
libraries.description: Academic library serving university students and researchers, with access to research journals, group study rooms, and digital lending services.

libraries.name: Katara Art Center Library
libraries.description: Specialty library focused on art, design, and culture. Offers creative workshops, exhibition catalogs, and a relaxing reading lounge.

libraries.name: Msheireb Museums Library
libraries.description: Museum library with a focus on Qatari history, museum archives, and digital kiosks. Offers guided tours and quiet study zones.

grocery_shops.name: Carrefour Qatar
grocery_shops.description: Large international supermarket chain offering a wide range of groceries, fresh produce, bakery, and delivery services. Convenient for all daily needs.

grocery_shops.name: Monoprix Qatar
grocery_shops.description: French supermarket with a focus on organic and gourmet products, deli counter, ready meals, and in-store café. Popular with expats and locals.

grocery_shops.name: Al Meera Supermarket
grocery_shops.description: Qatar's leading local supermarket chain, known for budget-friendly prices, local products, and convenient locations across the country.

grocery_shops.name: Spinneys Qatar
grocery_shops.description: Premium supermarket with a wide selection of international brands, fresh bakery, seafood, and organic products. Offers home delivery.

grocery_shops.name: Mega Mart
grocery_shops.description: Supermarket specializing in imported goods, fresh produce, and a snack bar. Known for its variety and international selection.

attractions.name: Museum of Islamic Art
attractions.description: World-class museum showcasing Islamic art spanning 1,400 years from three continents. Designed by I.M. Pei, it features rare manuscripts, ceramics, textiles, and a stunning waterfront setting.

attractions.name: Katara Cultural Village
attractions.description: Qatar's premier destination for arts and culture, featuring galleries, theaters, restaurants, a beach, and regular festivals. Home to the iconic amphitheater and Blue Mosque.

attractions.name: The Pearl Qatar
attractions.description: Luxury man-made island with marinas, shopping, dining, and residential areas. Known for its Mediterranean-style architecture, waterfront promenades, and vibrant nightlife.

attractions.name: National Museum of Qatar
attractions.description: Architecturally stunning museum telling the story of Qatar's history, culture, and people. Interactive exhibits, immersive galleries, and the iconic Desert Rose design.

attractions.name: Imam Muhammad ibn Abd al-Wahhab Mosque
attractions.description: Qatar's national mosque, known for its grand architecture, large prayer halls, and cultural events. Open to visitors outside prayer times, with guided tours available.

attractions.name: Barzan Towers
attractions.description: Restored 19th-century watchtowers offering panoramic views and historical exhibits. A symbol of Qatar's heritage and defense history.

attractions.name: Mathaf: Arab Museum of Modern Art
attractions.description: Museum dedicated to modern and contemporary Arab art, with rotating exhibitions, workshops, and guided tours. Inspiring for art lovers and students.

attractions.name: Sheikh Faisal Bin Qassim Al Thani Museum
attractions.description: Extensive private museum with collections of Islamic artifacts, vintage cars, and Qatari heritage. Family-friendly and educational, with guided tours available.

attractions.name: Souq Waqif Art Center
attractions.description: Vibrant art center in the heart of Souq Waqif, featuring exhibitions, artist studios, workshops, and cultural events. Great for art lovers and tourists.

attractions.name: Al Zubarah Fort
attractions.description: Historic desert fort and UNESCO World Heritage Site, offering insight into Qatar's trading and pearling past. Features archaeological remains and a small museum.

events.name: Qatar International Food Festival
events.description: Qatar's largest food festival, featuring international cuisines, celebrity chefs, live cooking shows, and family entertainment. A must-visit for foodies.
events.best_time_to_visit: Evening for live shows and fireworks

events.name: Doha Jewellery & Watches Exhibition
events.description: Prestigious exhibition showcasing luxury jewelry and watches from international brands. Includes workshops, auctions, and exclusive previews.

events.name: Ajyal Film Festival
events.description: International film festival celebrating cinema, creativity, and youth. Features screenings, workshops, and red carpet events.

events.name: Qatar National Day
events.description: National holiday celebrating Qatar's independence and heritage. Includes parades, fireworks, cultural shows, and public celebrations across the country.

events.name: Qatar ExxonMobil Open
events.description: International tennis tournament attracting top-ranked players. Features world-class matches, fan zones, and family activities.
